intro: Allegedly, Jabez was in the wrong place at the wrong time on August 28, 2017. It is believed that he witnessed the murder of Travis Combs. Itâ€™s reported that he told some people that he knew who did it and a week later, he went missing. It was over a year before his remains were found in a more rural part of Sarasota, Florida.
summary: Jabez Spann was a 14-year-old who allegedly witnessed a murder. Then, he was murdered and people know who did it.
title: Jabez Spann
